resources.string: You lost! The correct word was:
No more words to choose from. Restart the game.
To save HangMan from being hanged, you need to guess the secret word!
To figure out the secret word, you need to guess one letter at the time.
If you guess correctly, all the occurrences of this letter will be revealed in the secret word.
If you can guess all the letters of the secret word, you win the game and HangMan is safe.
However, if you guess wrong six times HangMan will die, and you lose the game.
